Just started playing with a Steelseries Nimbus mfi controller, and the polarity of the throttle is incorrect or at least doesnt match the touch pad controls.  With the mfi controller, when you push the left analog stick forward, it slows the plane down instead of accelerating.  Pulling back on the left analog causes the plane to accelerate.  This is counterintuitive since the touch controls do the exact opposite.

Other flight sims and even other Sky Gambler games such as Storm Raiders typically have the left analog push forward to accelerate and pull backwards to decelerate.

I hope the Atypical Team can correct this or at least provide an option to invert the y axis for both left and right analog sticks.
